hypothesis_content.title: High Gas Price Compression Signals ETH Accumulation Before Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas prices (7-day avg) drop below 15 gwei while BTC is in a BULL regime and ETH/BTC ratio is above 0.0335, ETH will outperform BTC by 8%+ over the next 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low gas prices in bull markets suggest network congestion relief and potential accumulation periods. Combined with strong ETH/BTC ratio, this indicates ETH is building strength for a relative breakout.

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH/BTC ratio increases by 8% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: ETH/BTC ratio decreases by 4% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH underperforms BTC by >4% within 10 days despite meeting all entry conditions in 20+ instances.
